methods.name: TotalAllocatedObjectSize
methods.logic: Atomically loads and returns the current value of the total_allocated_object_size_ counter. This represents the total size of objects allocated on the heap.

methods.name: TotalAllocatedSpace
methods.logic: Atomically loads and returns the current value of the total_allocated_space_ counter. This represents the total space allocated (including overhead) on the heap.
